articles.author: Michelle Starr
articles.title: Discovery of 1.5-Million-Year-Old Bone Tools Rewrites Early Human History - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Bone artifacts discovered in Tanzania push back the earliest known date of bone tool technology by over a million years.
articles.content:
Bone artifacts discovered in Tanzania push back the earliest known date of bone tool technology by over a million years.
In Olduvai Gorge, archaeologists have discovered a range of bone tools though… [+4765 chars]
